Values.CERTIFICATES_KEY_VAULT: The key vault containing the certificates.
Values.APIM_TENANT_ID: The id of the tenant hosting APIM.
Values.APIM_SP_CLIENT_ID: The client id of the service principal that can manage APIM.
Values.APIM_SP_CLIENT_SECRET: The client secret of the service principal that can manage APIM.
Values.APIM_SUBSCRIPTION_ID: The id of the subscription owning the APIM service.
Values.APIM_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME: The name of the resource group owning the APIM service.
